comments.text: See https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=679476#c17 for more info. Whoever fixes this will need to remember to create new strings, not just change the existing string to use %S instead of %s.
comments.raw_text: See https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=679476#c17 for more info. Whoever fixes this will need to remember to create new strings, not just change the existing string to use %S instead of %s.
